lahiru ohuwa mathaken aathwena eka walakwanna honda sansiddhiyak athi karala thiyenawa.eeka ohuge upakramayak.namuth ohu me sanuka kiyana kenawa uda daddi amathaka karana deyak thamayi idiriyedi thawath sanuka la bihiwenna puluwan saha ethakota ee sanukata wenneth lahiruta wela thiyena dema kiyala.othana lahiru karala thiyenne mechchara kalayak elipita abhiyoga nokarapu maha prathirupa kiyala salakapu rupa dekakata hu kiyana eka.eeken aaraksha wenna thamayi thamange mangala chayarupaya ada ganne othanata.meka hariyata kale mahalu kulu mimekuta nariyek hu kiyala bari wela hari harak ranchuwen thamanta gemak deyi kiyala passa bala bala sinhayek gawata duwanawa, api sinhayage wate inne kiyala wage.

ihatha udaharanaya warthamanaye balawathwa thibena sinhala bauddha sanskruthiya pilibada adhipathi kathikawatha therum ganima sadaha pasubimak sakas karanneya.awurudu dedahas gananak thisse pawatha ena nirmala sinhala bauddha sanskruthiyak pilibada adahasata wishala ithihasayak atha.eya aduma tharamin anagarika dharmapalathumage kalaya dakwa diwa yayi."ape sinhala sanskruthiya" pilibada mema kathikawathehi lakshana kihipayaki.

ema wishaya sambandhayen ohuge hadarim ha aashrayan grantha gatha wanne ‘sanniwedana adhyayana ithihasaya’, ‘goliyakaranaya sanskruthiya ha sanniwedanaya’, ‘wilbar shram’, sanniwedana adhyayanayehi pithruwaraya’ yana sahithya wichara grantha thrithwayeni.‘sanniwedana adhyayana ithihasaya’ kruthiya magin sakachchawata bandun karanne sanniwedanaya namathi wishaya lokaye samajayagatha wima, ehi wyapthiya, wardhanaya pilibanda katha kirimayi.wisheshayenma sanniwedanaya kiyana wishaya shikshanayak thula lokaye patamalagatha kara iganwima aarambha wima pilibanda mehidi awadhanaya yomu kerenawa.
issellama tiwi thiraya issaraha inna ekata kiyanawa onna api dan ahawalawa bayit karannayi yanne kiyala.
dakunu saha uthuru koriyanu sakachcha yalith wathawak
oya samiyata awankawa aadaraya karanawa nam, ewan samiyek obata labadun ohuge mawata da etharamma garuthwayak oyage hithe thiyenna oona.
mathu wana prashna kipayak saha pilithuru mese ya:
kohoma unath dud jiwithe mata mehema padamak ugannala thiyenawa.
bhikshunwahansela me rate eda patanma samaja balawegayak wela hitiye, aagamika balawegayak witharak noweyi.
ape pem hasuna,
